General.Name: Premier Tank Corp. PCL
General.Description: Premier Tank Corporation Public Company Limited engages in the operating oil and fuel tank farm services for receiving, storage, blend, and distributing of petroleum products and other hazardous substances in Thailand. It operates Khon Kaen and Sisaket oil depots in the Northeastern region. Premier Tank Corporation Public Company Limited was founded in 2013 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.
